price: (80) [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلۡأَخۡضَرِ نَارٗا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنۡهُ تُوقِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakum mina al-shajari al-akhḍari nāran fa-idhā antum min'hu tūqidūna
